page.title: 16Supernatural
page.content: During the 1670's some leading local citizens attempted to reclaim a large part of{Montrose Basin}for farming purposes.This reclamation project was butressed by an embankment,or dyke, known as{"Dronners"}dyke which stretched from the east to the west of the Basin.The aim was to confine the River Southesk to a narrower channnel and to prevent the sea from inundating the reclaimed land. The{"Dronners"}dyke,due to defects in its construction,was destroyed by a violent storm in the winter of 1678. Most folks said that it would have survived unharmed if Maggie Cowie,a local witch,had left it alone.At the height of the storm she stuck her finger into it and sent it tumbling. More recently, a number of phantom airmen, killed at{Montrose,}have been seen many years after their deaths.
